website_summaries.verdict: There isn’t a tougher natural antler or horn-type chew available than a water buffalo’s. After all, if they can scare off a wild tiger, they’ll stand up to playtime with your dog.
pros: Inspected to meet USDA and FDA standards

customer_reviews.title: Happy Dogs Months Later
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these months ago after reading an article saying they were good for aggressive chewers. I'll be honest, my girls don't pick these to chew EVERY night, but they grab them fairly consistently from the toy basket and they hardly look worn down! I do notice a faint smell from these bones, but it's not intense nor does it stick to the blankets or dog beds. These bones also don't stain anything. When guest dogs visit our house, they also often pick out these bones. As a whole, I think they're a great, healthy, and natural choice for dog chews that are ACTUALLY durable and hold up to destructive chewers.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan McCaffery

customer_reviews.title: One was much smaller then the other. For the price I expected two large.
customer_reviews.text: One was less then half the size of the other! Luckily I got them for two different dogs, black/white mix is only 17lb, the white/merle is 135lb. I gave it 3 stars because it does work for my dogs, and they love the flavor, but not 5 stars because one is so tiny, the description does not say that... It leads you to believe you are getting two large, but you actually get a large and a small... I would return because of the price and misleading description, but not worth it in a pandemic with bored dogs... Grocery stores sell large for $6... Only if this combo was $10 and labeled for small dogs it would be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Addierm97

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My lab and pittie love these. They will take turns stealing them from each other and chew on them daily. Good sizes as promised and thick. I have had them a few months and do not need to replace them yet. Ended up getting them for my mom's two dogs (a lab and a border collie), too. They love them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs and they both love these horns. They do have a bit of an odor when they are chewing on them. Smells like a hair salon. Yes I know what the horns are made of. I haven't noticed any visible mess. They are good for chewing and I've been checking to make sure that no teeth have been broken during. All seems to be going well.
customer_reviews.author: putthemteethaway

customer_reviews.title: Antlers are a better choice.
customer_reviews.text: Three stars for keeping the dog busy, but you must be careful, the splinter and break to small pieces, that could be dangerous. One horn was hollow, the other was solid. Antlers are a better choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amnon Feiner

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and dogs love em
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and dogs love em! Both large one just a bit smaller than other. Price ok about the same or less in pet store. Would buy again but lasts a long time even with pit bulls that love to chew. Woof.
customer_reviews.author: AugustWest

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting chew toy!
customer_reviews.text: My goldendoodle Gary loves his water buffalo horn and has barely been able to scratch the surface. If you have hardwood floors I would only give your dog this bone on carpet because it is pretty heavy and they will drop it on the floor, potentially damaging hardwoods.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Dunning

customer_reviews.title: These use to be amazing...
customer_reviews.text: I have a serious chewer! He can get through just about any toy in record time except these! The first set I ordered him are still going strong and it's been about a year. I ordered a second set and I have to say I'm a bit disappointed. The new horns are hollow yet all my old ones are solid. This seems to make them less durable. Within about 20 minutes, they started peeling leaving giant chunks all over my carpet. I was able to clean them up enough so they are still usable and my dog isn't swallowing whole pieces but I wish they were as amazing as the originals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: Literally feel apart after a few days. I have a Dalmatian and German Wirehaired who love horns. These became dangerous after a few days with the sharp points and chunks that would come off.
customer_reviews.author: Damien

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for tough crewers. We have an Olde English Bulldoggee and she absolutely loves these things. They keep her busy for hours!
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: They like them but I will I could also use these ...
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger and heavier than expected. I was expecting the hollow shed horns but these are solid and were cut right off the animal. Way too big for my french bulldogs. They like them but I will I could also use these as very effective home defense weapons.
customer_reviews.author: cycorider

customer_reviews.title: fantastic product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of these when I first ordered because my very large Pit/lab mix is a destroyer of anything she can get her teeth on. I am pleased to say that a couple months later she's barely made a dent in these horns! They have given her hours of chewing enjoyment! Totally worth the price if you go threw chew toys and rawhides, ect like popcorn!
customer_reviews.author: TonofThorns

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love water buffalo horns
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love water buffalo horns. I decided on this brand this time as it was in a two pack. Received them promptly. However, when they started chewing, they immediately started breaking apart at the larger end. Was not impressed and will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Wampler

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them!
customer_reviews.text: The dogs love them and they last a long time. It's been more than a month of them chewing on it every day and they are barely dented! Definitely worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: katey palumbo

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: Our 30 lb mix didn't like these; too heavy and big.
customer_reviews.author: Billy R. Hulsey

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY something you don't have to buy twice!
customer_reviews.text: Wit's end for something unplastic for my dogs to chew but not ingest. This is it! Doesn't smell and they haven't made any dents in them yet.
customer_reviews.author: samloomis

customer_reviews.title: other things for dogs to chew on. i believe ...
customer_reviews.text: other things for dogs to chew on.i believe they are hunted for this and i am not okay with this ;(
customer_reviews.author: jennifer fiore

customer_reviews.title: Smells like hot piss but seems durable
customer_reviews.text: My dog works on this horn a couple times a week and it’s still in very good shape. It reeks when they chew it so be prepared for that fun.
customer_reviews.author: Fischergirl

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting chew for the dog who runs through raw hides!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome long lasting chew! It does leave nasty chunks and shards on your flooring!
customer_reviews.author: busymom4

customer_reviews.title: Corgi absolutely loved these. She carried them and buried them in ...
customer_reviews.text: Corgi absolutely loved these. She carried them and buried them in her hiding spots in the house.. Little spooky when you go to bed and reach under your pillow and feel something curved and hard.. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Theresa O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: My dogs loved these, but I didn't like the odor
customer_reviews.text: My dogs loved these, but I didn't like the odor. Won't be buying them again due to the odor. Maybe now that Spring is here, I can put them in the yard for our dogs to enjoy outside.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Manning

customer_reviews.title: WAY too small
customer_reviews.text: The size of these are ridiculous. I bought the two pack and one is absolutely massive, but the other is incredibly small. The small one is so much smaller than any horn I've ever bought, from ones listed as smalls to larges.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: One horn shredded into sharp pieces within first minutes
customer_reviews.text: One antler shredded into sharp pieces within the first few minutes of my dog chewing it. This was a real disappointment because the other horn lasted a long time, a few months of intermittent chewing. I would not give a product that fails like this to my dog to consume.
customer_reviews.author: Lilyblue

customer_reviews.title: Amazing chew for our big dogs
customer_reviews.text: We have two 60lb dogs who destroy every toy we buy for them 😕 Until NOW! These buffalo horns are awesome. They are tough, durable and although they can be ultimately eaten they will last for quite a while. We will rebuy these when our dogs use them up but I don't think that'll be for a good long while!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Webber

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: My dog chews through everything within a day or two....elk antlers, supposedly indestructible toys....and this is still going strong months later! Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I ever made
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I ever made. My dog hates nylabones and devours large bully sticks in under 30 min. Hes a puppy but a big one so hes constantly into everything. He's been chewing this thing for hours and hardly made a dent. And he loves it. He's obsessed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They splinter and are unsafe for dogs
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. These splintered immediately and I had to take them away from my dogs and search the house for splinters. I sent them back for a refund but apparently they never made it back as I was still charged. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lithgow!

customer_reviews.title: ... worried about what the size might be but very pleased to see that they are actually bigger then the ...
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about what the size might be but very pleased to see that they are actually bigger then the ones I get at big name pet store & price at store is about $9+ so reasonable priced, but the convenience of it being delivered at home was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: mayra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: tend to splinter a bit, but my dog LOVES them! She only chews on these instead of furniture now.
customer_reviews.author: Roadkiill

customer_reviews.title: The is the only product we have found that our ...
customer_reviews.text: The is the only product we have found that our black lab does not destroy immediately. He has been working on the first one now for two weeks. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scout says if you only get one treat...
customer_reviews.text: The only treats my dog cannot destruct -and- which he is still enjoying months later. He keeps one outdoors and one indoors. Just got when I think he's lost interest, I will happen upon him happily chewing one.
customer_reviews.author: chakramama

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic! They last for many months on a VERY ...
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! They last for many months on a VERY aggressive chewer. We have a large breed puppy that has been chewing vigorously for weeks now and he still has a long way to go! Plus, they do not stink at all - we love them!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: These horns were much larger than I had assumed! ...
customer_reviews.text: These horns were much larger than I had assumed! No complaints though bc I have a 7 month old puppy who loves to chew and she loves these horns. She was so excited to receive a horn last night and wagged her tail the entire time she had it. These are much more cost effective through amazon...... Petsmart is triple the cost. Highly recommed for people with large breed dogs who destroy other toys in under an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie S Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dog present
customer_reviews.text: These went over very well as a gift for a family member's two golden retrievers. They had never seen these treats before and were shocked at how much their dogs loved them
customer_reviews.author: Melanie A.

customer_reviews.title: My 70 lb, 7 month rottie puppy loves these ...
customer_reviews.text: My 70 lb, 7 month rottie puppy loves these! Kept her busy for hours, doesn't smell at all, not broken pieces.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have to Huskies and they love these and they last a long time!!
customer_reviews.author: Markim

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bulldog was able to crush it and it broke into dangerous pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a repeat purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I was initially worried about bone splinters but they haven't been an issue for my pomski. She loves them and have lasted longer than a lot of other natural chews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Huge horns bigger than I thought my pup will sure get my money's worth of chewing
customer_reviews.author: jollygorilla

customer_reviews.title: Great Size, As Described
customer_reviews.text: Large pieces as described. My dog isn't interested in the horns but these are exactly as described and cheaper than buying individuals at a pet store.
customer_reviews.author: Flip

customer_reviews.title: Threw mine away
customer_reviews.text: Is hollow on the inside which just makes it shard everywhere. I've stepped on countless shards of this product. Would probably be 5 stars if it had a solid core
customer_reviews.author: mahmood abusamha

customer_reviews.title: I think this product works better.
customer_reviews.text: My dog can spend hours with this chew. It doesn't smell (like the sheep horn). However, given the choice between the smelly sheep horn and the buffalo horn, he'll pick the sheep horn, take it, chew it for a while and bury it. So, in the end, I think this product works better.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cronk

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love them - take forever to break them down, so will last weeks for the biggest chewer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for splinters!
customer_reviews.text: Splintered so bad I had to throw out within 10 minutes. I have bought buffalo horns from other vendors for years and never had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: One normal, One Small
customer_reviews.text: Very dissapointed with this purchase, especially for the price paid. One was normal size, the other was not quite half the size...see photo!
customer_reviews.author: Alyson R Rome

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Quality product at great price. I had been purchasing at local pet store at so much higher price and smaller size. Will definitely continue to buy through this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: C. Blythe

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: We are noticing splintering with this brand. Other horns we have had, did not splinter.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Boyce

customer_reviews.title: Great product for dogs
customer_reviews.text: They are great, my dog loved them! I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A Berlin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. She hasn't made a dent in them. Definately a winner at my house.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These horns are larger than I expected. My dog loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Judith R. White

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Give to your dog and they'll chew for hours. Non stop
customer_reviews.author: hoagie64

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Both bones were roughly the same size, on the med/large size. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your search is over
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have chewed on rawhide, nylabones, bully sticks, elk antlers, the occasion leather belt, tennis balls, and each other. These, by far, have kept my 2 aussiedoodles more entertained than any of the above. Minimal mess, smell, long lasting, and lower pain when stepped on but they do hurt when you stub your toe on one at 3am. I'll take the bad for the good. And if anyone is counting, my preference for the above is 1) buffalo horns 2) elk antlers 3) the rest of them and they are way distant contenders.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Hollow One tore apart the first day. Filled one is holding strong
customer_reviews.author: Christhian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my puppy likes them very much. The horns are large and apparently indestructible
customer_reviews.author: Albert Jones

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last long with my heeler, broke in shards within 10 minutes
customer_reviews.author: sally mcguinn

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!  Dangerous !
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! Bought 2 for 2 German Shepherds. One was big and thin, the other small and hard. My male shattered the end of the thin one in 5 minutes. It splintered so I tossed both!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe P.

customer_reviews.title: The dogs loved these. They kept burying them in the couch ...
customer_reviews.text: The dogs loved these. They kept burying them in the couch to hide them from each other. It's time for new ones now.
customer_reviews.author: Treauna Cuthbertson

customer_reviews.title: My dog seems to like it.
customer_reviews.text: Only part of my order that didnt need to be returned. My dog seems to like it..there for i like them.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous for dogs
customer_reviews.text: These are dangerous. My two puppies chewed on them and the horns splintered into small pieces. They need to discontinue these immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Graffo

product_meta.title: Top Dog Chews 2 Pack Natural Water Buffalo Horns Edible Treats
product_meta.description: This is an all natural product. Comes from free ranging Water Buffalo. Promotes Healthy Teeth and Gums.
feature_bullets: 2 Pack includes 1 Large/Medium and 1 Medium/Small Horn
Always supervise your dog when giving them chews
